### About
I am a second year MPH student at [Mailman School of Public Health - Columbia University](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/), majoring in Biostatistics, with a certificate in Advanced Epidemiology. I obtained my BS in Statistics from [University of California, Davis](https://www.ucdavis.edu/). I am interested in clinical research and my career goal is to become a biostatistician in pharmaceutical industry.
